Name: Monza
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop the flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Often made with up to four times as much bitter liqueur but in such high doses this dominates the other ingredients. Hence in December 2020, thanks to a comment below, we made our recipe more restrained to allow the passion fruit to shine while delivering a relatively dry cocktail.
History: A classic cocktail promoted by Campari and named after the Italian Grand Prix circuit.
